rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: An commercial egg production facility in Buena Vista County, Iowa, constituted the largest infected flock and was made up of more than 5.3 million chickens, the U.S.D.A. said.
